mapper.select: select u.id,u.username,u.password from user u,user_role r where u.username=#{username} and u.password=#{password} and u.id=r.user_id and (r.role_id=8 or r.role_id=9)
select distinct rm.menu_id from user_role ur left join role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id = #{id}
select distinct u.* from user_role ur left join role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join user u on ur.user_id = u.id where rm.menu_id = #{id}

select u.id,u.username,u.avatar,u.description,u.name,u.created,u.updated,d.dname,u.status from user u,department d,department_doctor dd where u.username like '%${name}%' and u.id = dd.doctor_id and dd.department = d.office_id limit #{current},#{size}

select u.id,u.username,u.avatar,u.description,u.name,u.created,u.updated,d.office_id,u.status from user u,department d,department_doctor dd where u.id = #{id} and u.id = dd.doctor_id and dd.department = d.office_id
